content: **nivosa hat** is a unisex wintery colorwork hat made with a dk weight yarn with two highly contrasting colors four adult sizes presented in a pattern ensure that you will be able to get a perfect fit for a desired look this hat has a great potential for experimenting with colors you can use light background as shown in a sample and get classical wintery feel or you can reverse it and make it dark with striking light snowflakes even the largest size doesn t take a lot of yarn in any color so you can use this hat as a stash buster this pattern has a complete video tutorial to help you along in this pattern you also have an opportunity to learn how to make a faux fur pompom it is very easy with a help of another video tutorial there is also a tutorial for a fleece lining for a hat if you have sensitive skin on your forehead or just don t want to have an imprint of a ribbing after wearing a hat or if your winter is too cold and windy for a knitted hat give it a try the links for thevideo tutorial for lining and for making a faux fur pompom are provided difficulty level advanced beginner intermediate experienced techniques used knit purl working in the round on circular
